string:
This is an erotic text quest/economy/management game, inspired by games written by Xadera, Cmaleod, Fenoxo and Tacoking.
WARNING! This game contains some extreme sexual content, if that is not to your tastes please close the game now. If your age is legal for playing erotic games, you may proceed. If not, please close this window and erase your copy of game. :)
Please understand, my native language is not english and was not a language I learned in school. If you find any typos or issues with grammar, you are welcome to modify the files and send me a corrected version.
Big thanks to all who contribute their efforts to the game.
Scripters and Modders: Cymic44, FB, Auctus177, SRP Somerandomppl. Writers: microsoftjamie, john doe, Shutizaki, pboy 1717. Editors: X, ads, Iddy, pboy 1717, Shutizaki, Venus.
Also, please take a few minutes to read the license.
